description: Graduated KTC (Krasnodar Technical College) and worked as a specialty electrician for high voltage substations. Later qualified as a Crossfit trainer.
Underwent a digital marketing course and started working as a PPC and project manager in a local web studio. Started freelance practice after 3 months.
Became more interested in IT and tried programming. Underwent Java course and completed a project.
Decided to pursue a career in Frontend Development and started learning.
Decided to pursue a career in Frontend Development and started learning.
